notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Lihong Yuan and Jinping Chen conceived and designed the experiments. Lihong Yuan, Min Li, Linmiao Li and Xiaolin Mei carried out the lab work. Lihong Yuan and Min Li participated in data analysis. Lihong Yuan, Jinping Chen, Corina Monagin, Aleksei Chmura, Bradley S. Schneider, Jonathan H. Epstein, Zhengli Shi and Peter Daszak wrote the paper.
